title: Still can't change region
body: I have a friend who has spent well over £3k on his league account, but wants to move from EUNE to EUW. As far as I know, he couldn't due to some pre-season melarky. It says that regions cannot be changed until the **20th of November**, but it's the 21st and there's no further information as to why he cant change, is something happening on my end or what is this?

replies.body: They were aimed to return, but it looks to be delayed.  I don't have any info on this right now, but it's known.  Thanks for the heads up, and hang tight for updates as they come.

Hi Porocles,
I heard a rumor saying the start of December any confirmation on this? Kinda want to change region atm so i can play the project event with my friends...)::
So if its after the 4th of december i will have 0 chance to play the game mode since i dont enjoy playing solo.

> [{quoted}](name=IorguV,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ab0zvEYZ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-01-02T11:06:14.575+0000)
>
> Any update on this???

i need to know if there is an update om this aswell
I'm having exactly the same problem, i also hoped that i would be able to move my account to euw from eune, but it's still not available in the shop...

Ok folks, check this out. Finally, after days I got answer on a simple question from SUpport. ... https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update

Looks like 5-6 weeks more
Is there any update on this folks ?
I hope they make it free again to change cause this waiting is annoying  {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
